site.name: Bergen Mind & Wellness
site.description: Compassionate, evidence-based mental health treatment in New Jersey

home.title: Mental Health Care in Bergen County, NJ | Bergen Mind & Wellness
home.description: Compassionate, evidence-based mental health treatment in New Jersey. Specializing in depression, anxiety, ADHD, bipolar disorder & PTSD. Virtual appointments available.

about.title: About Rocio Jenkins, PMHNP-BC | Bergen Mind & Wellness
about.description: Meet Rocio Jenkins, board-certified psychiatric nurse practitioner specializing in depression, anxiety, ADHD, bipolar disorder, and PTSD treatment in New Jersey.

contact.title: Contact Us | Schedule an Appointment | Bergen Mind & Wellness
contact.description: Schedule a mental health appointment with Bergen Mind & Wellness. Virtual and in-person consultations available in New Jersey.

screening.title: Free Mental Health Screening Tools | Bergen Mind & Wellness
screening.description: Free, confidential mental health screenings for depression (PHQ-9), anxiety (GAD-7), ADHD (ASRS), bipolar disorder (MDQ), and PTSD (PCL-5).

education.title: Mental Health Education | Bergen Mind & Wellness
education.description: Evidence-based information about mental health conditions, treatments, and recovery. Learn about depression, anxiety, ADHD, bipolar disorder, and PTSD.

nutrition.title: Nutrition & Mental Health | Brain-Healthy Foods | Bergen Mind & Wellness
nutrition.description: Discover how nutrition impacts mental health. Learn about brain-healthy foods for depression, anxiety, ADHD, and cognitive function.

mindfulness.title: Mindfulness Practices for Mental Health | Bergen Mind & Wellness
mindfulness.description: Guided mindfulness practices, meditation, breathing exercises, and journaling techniques to support mental wellness.

appointments.title: Schedule an Appointment | Book Consultation | Bergen Mind & Wellness
appointments.description: Book your mental health appointment online. Flexible scheduling for psychiatry consultations, medication management, and therapy sessions in New Jersey.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy | Bergen Mind & Wellness
privacy.description: Our commitment to protecting your privacy and health information. HIPAA-compliant mental health services.

terms.title: Terms of Service | Bergen Mind & Wellness
terms.description: Terms and conditions for using Bergen Mind & Wellness services.
